Class FESI.Interpreter.Evaluator 

FESI.Interpreter.Evaluator
public class Evaluator
Defines the evaluation interface and contains the evaluation context.

Important: This object is also used as the synchronization object - all entries into the evaluation process must be synchronized on the evaluator, as the inside of the evaluator is not synchronized for speed reasons.

Evaluator()
Create a new empty evaluator

addExtension(String)
Add an extension by name, load it if not already loaded
addMandatoryExtension(String)
Add an extension by name, load it if not already loaded.
addMandatoryExtension(String, JSExtension)
Add an initialized extension.
createVariable(String, int)
Create variable only if does not already exist (do not overwrite parameters and functions of the same name)
doIndirectCall(ESObject, String, int, ESValue[])
Call a routine referenced by name (in the scope chain)
evaluate(File)
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate a file
evaluate(File, ESObject)
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate a file
evaluate(ParsedProgram, ESObject, boolean)
Top level core evaluator (on parsed program), Must be called from a function synchronized on the evaluator
evaluate(Reader)
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate on anonymous stream with null thisObject
evaluate(Reader, ESObject)
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate on anonymous stream
evaluate(Reader, ESObject, EvaluationSource, boolean)
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate on identified stream
evaluate(String)
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate on an anonymous string
evaluate(String, ESObject, boolean)
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate on an anonymous string with thisObject and acceptBoolean
evaluate(String, String)
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate on an identified string (used by the GUI)
evaluateEvalString(String)
Sub evaluator - evaluate an eval string in a program (not a top level evaluation !)
evaluateEvent(ESWrapper, ESObject, Object[])
subevaluator - Evaluate an event function - must be synchronized
evaluateFunction(ASTStatementList, EvaluationSource, ESObject, Vector, ESObject)
subevaluator - Evaluate a function node (inside a program evaluation)
evaluateLoadFile(File)
Sub evaluator - evaluate a loaded file as program (not a top level evaluation !)
evaluateLoadModule(String)
Sub evaluator - evaluate a module (a file or jar entry loaded via the FESI.path) as program (not a top level evaluation !)
evaluateWith(ASTStatement, ESObject, EvaluationSource)
Sub evaluator - evaluate a with node (inside a program evaluation)

addExtension 
 public Object addExtension(String name) throws EcmaScriptException
Add an extension by name, load it if not already loaded

Parameters:
name - the name of the extension to load
Returns:
the loaded object or null in case of error
Throws: Error
ini initalizing the extension
addMandatoryExtension 
 public Object addMandatoryExtension(String name) throws EcmaScriptException
Add an extension by name, load it if not already loaded. Generate an error if not found

Parameters:
name - the name of the extension to load
Returns:
the loaded object
Throws: EcmaScriptException
if the extension cannot be loaded or error during initilization

 public Object addMandatoryExtension(String name,
                                     JSExtension extension) throws EcmaScriptException

Parameters:
name - the name of the extension to load
extension - The extension object
Returns:
the loaded object
Throws: EcmaScriptException
if the extension cannot be loaded or error during initilization

doIndirectCall 
 public ESValue doIndirectCall(ESObject thisObject,
                               String functionName,
                               int hash,
                               ESValue arguments[]) throws EcmaScriptException
Call a routine referenced by name (in the scope chain)

Parameters:
thisObject - the this of the called routine
functionName - The name of the function
Its - hash code
arguments - The argument array
Returns:
the resulting value
Throws: EmcaScriptException
In case of any error during evaluation
createVariable 
 public void createVariable(String name,
                            int hashCode) throws EcmaScriptException

Parameters:
name - the new variable name
hashCode - Its hash code
Throws: EmcaScriptException
In case of any error during setting

Parameters:
leftValue - The reference to the variable to modify
rightValue - The value to set
Throws: EmcaScriptException
In case of any error during evaluation

evaluateFunction 
 public ESValue evaluateFunction(ASTStatementList node,
                                 EvaluationSource es,
                                 ESObject variableObject,
                                 Vector localVariableNames,
                                 ESObject thisObject) throws EcmaScriptException
subevaluator - Evaluate a function node (inside a program evaluation)

Parameters:
node - The AST node representing the list of statements
es - The evaluation source information for backtracce
localVariableNames - The set of local variable to create
thisObject - The this of this evaluation (so to speak)
Returns:
The last value of the evaluation
Throws: EmcaScriptException
In case of any error during evaluation
evaluateWith 
 public ESValue evaluateWith(ASTStatement node,
                             ESObject scopeObject,
                             EvaluationSource es) throws EcmaScriptException
Sub evaluator - evaluate a with node (inside a program evaluation)

Parameters:
node - The with statement body
scopeObject - the new scope for this with
es - The evaluation source for back trace
Returns:
The last value of the evaluation
Throws: EmcaScriptException
In case of any error during evaluation
evaluate 
 public ESValue evaluate(ParsedProgram program,
                         ESObject thisObject,
                         boolean acceptReturn) throws EcmaScriptException
Top level core evaluator (on parsed program), Must be called from a function synchronized on the evaluator

Parameters:
program - The parsed program information
thisObject - The this of the evaluation (usually the global object)
acceptReturn - If true accept a return statement in the body
Returns:
The last value of the evaluation
Throws: EmcaScriptException
In case of any error during evaluation
evaluateEvent 
 public synchronized void evaluateEvent(ESWrapper sourceObject,
                                        ESObject theFunction,
                                        Object args[]) throws EcmaScriptException
subevaluator - Evaluate an event function - must be synchronized

Parameters:
sourceObject - The source of the event (wrapped)
theFunction - The function to call
args - The arguments of the event
Throws: EmcaScriptException
In case of any error during evaluation
evaluate 
 public synchronized ESValue evaluate(Reader is,
                                      ESObject thisObject,
                                      EvaluationSource es,
                                      boolean acceptReturn) throws EcmaScriptException
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate on identified stream

Parameters:
is - Input stream to evaluate
thisObject - The this of this evaluation
es - the identification of the source for back trace
acceptReturn - If true accepts return in main body
Returns:
The last value of the evaluation
Throws: EmcaScriptException
In case of any error during evaluation

evaluate 
 public synchronized ESValue evaluate(String theSource,
                                      ESObject thisObject,
                                      boolean returnAccepted) throws EcmaScriptException
Top eval (synchronized) evaluate on an anonymous string with thisObject and acceptBoolean

Parameters:
theSource - source to evaluate
thisObject - this for the evaluation
returnAccepted - If true a return is accepted in the main body
Returns:
The last value of the evaluation
Throws: EmcaScriptException
In case of any error during evaluation
